  ## Description

  It is a project.
  function generateMotivation(data) {
   if (!data.motivation) {
      return "";
   }
   return `
   #### Motivation

   ${data.motivation}
   `
}
  function generateSolution(data) {
   if (!data.solution) {
      return "";
   }
   return `
   #### What this project solves for:

   ${data.solution}
   `
}
  function generateLink(data) {
   if (!data.link) {
      return "";
   }
   return `
   #### Deployed Site:

   ${data.link}
   `
}

  #### Built With

  JS, NodeJS, Inquirer

  ## Installation

  To work

  ## Contributing

  function generateContributors(data) {
   if (!data.contributorsList) {
      return "";
   }
   return `
   #### A special thanks to the following contributor(s):

   ${data.contributorsList}
   `
}
  They can't
